CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 31, 1955, pg. B4, reads: "Gaines Christmas Party - Each Yuletide for many past years, youngsters, like those pictured surrounding Mrs. Julia B. Gaines, a real Santa's helper, have attended the Gaines' Funeral Home's annual Christmas parties in East Liberty. The facial expressions of the kids reflect the good time they had. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children, including boy near right holding camera, surrounding Julia Gaines and Christmas tree, for Christmas party in Gaines Funeral Home
